name: Zoom
description: The app integrates with Zoom Meetings API to perform investigative and generic actions

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

actions.verbose: In user_id parameter, user ID or user's email can be used. Also, we can pass the me value for current user. The parameter auto_recording would set the place to save the meeting recording: local - Record the meeting locally, cloud - Record the meeting to the cloud, none - Auto-recording disabled.

alternative_hosts.description: Comma-separated list of the meeting's alternative hosts' email addresses or IDs

continuous_meeting_chat.description: Whether to enable the continuous meeting chat setting

meeting_invitees.description: Comma-separated list of the meeting's invitees

example_values: This is test agenda for create meeting action. This is test agenda for create meeting action. This is test agenda for create meeting action.

actions.verbose: Deletes previous and future zoom meetings.
